page.title: 11Homelife.Philip's Diary
page.content: On weekdays I get up at 6:45am.I have a wash and get dressed.I help with breakfast and watch breakfast TV.At 8:05am my sister goes to school and my mum sets out to work as a lollipop lady.I set off for school and call for my friend.When I get school I play rounders and football until 9:00am. At school we do English, Maths, History, Geography, Science, R.E, Art, Computer work and games etc.We have a break from from 10:35am to 10:50am and a lunch break from 12:15pm to 1:30pm. We finish at 3:30pm.When I get home I usually read or watch things on television.I watch things like Dungeons and Dragons and Blue Peter. Tea time is 6:00pm.My favourite meal is fish fingers,chips and beans.After tea I sometimes go to bed and read for a while.
